00066   inline int calculer_arete_paroi() const { return 1; }

00075   {
00076     Cerr << "arete_coin_fluide not coded for this scheme." << finl;
00077     Cerr << "For TRUST support: code like Eval_Amont_VDF_Face::flux_arete_coin_fluide()" << finl;
00078     Process::exit();
00079     return 1;
00080   }

00265 //************************

00268 
00269 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00270 inline double Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::surface_(int i,int j) const
00271 {
00272   const double surf = (DERIVED_T::IS_VAR || DERIVED_T::IS_TURB) ? 0.5*(surface(i)+surface(j)) :
00273                       0.5*(surface(i)*porosite(i)+surface(j)*porosite(j));
00274   return surf;
00275 }
00276 
00277 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00278 inline double Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::porosity_(int i,int j) const
00279 {
00280   const double poros = (DERIVED_T::IS_VAR || DERIVED_T::IS_TURB) ? 0.5*(porosite(i)+porosite(j)) : 1.0;
00281   return poros;
00282 }
00283 
00284 //********************************
00285 // Class templates specializations
00286 //********************************
00287 
00288 //// flux_arete_fluide
00289 //
00290 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00291 inline void Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::flux_arete_fluide(const DoubleTab& inco, int fac1,
00292                                                              int fac2, int fac3, int signe,
00293                                                              double& flux3, double& flux1_2) const
00294 {
00295   int rang1 = (fac1-premiere_face_bord);
00296   int rang2 = (fac2-premiere_face_bord);
00297   int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
00298   int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
00299   int ori= orientation(fac3);
00300   double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00301   double visc_turb = nu_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00302   double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00303   double poros = porosity_(fac1,fac2);
00304   double surfporos = surface(fac3)*porosite(fac3);
00305 
00306   double vit_imp = 0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang1,ori,la_zcl)+
00307                         Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang2,ori,la_zcl));
00308 
00309   double dist1 = dist_norm_bord(fac1);
00310   double dist2 = dist_face(fac1,fac2,ori);
00311 
00312   double tau = signe * (vit_imp - inco[fac3])/dist1;
00313   double tau_tr = (inco[fac2] - inco[fac1])/dist2;
00314   double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? (tau + tau_tr)*visc_turb : 0.0;
00315 
00316   if(DERIVED_T::IS_VAR && DERIVED_T::IS_TURB)
00317     {
00318       flux3 = ((tau+tau_tr)*visc_lam + reyn)*surf*poros;
00319       flux1_2 = ((tau+tau_tr)*visc_lam + reyn)*surfporos;
00320     }
00321   else
00322     {
00323       flux3 = (tau*visc_lam + reyn)*surf*poros;
00324       flux1_2 = (tau_tr*visc_lam + reyn)*surfporos;
00325     }
00326 }
00327 
00328 //// coeffs_arete_fluide
00329 //
00330 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00331 inline void Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::coeffs_arete_fluide(int fac1, int fac2, int fac3, int signe,
00332                                                                double& aii1_2, double& aii3_4,
00333                                                                double& ajj1_2) const
00334 {
00335   int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
00336   int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
00337   int ori= orientation(fac3);
00338   double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00339   double visc_turb = nu_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00340   double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00341   double poros = porosity_(fac1,fac2);
00342   double surfporos = surface(fac3)*porosite(fac3);
00343   double dist1 = dist_norm_bord(fac1);
00344   double dist2 = dist_face(fac1,fac2,ori);
00345   double tau = signe/dist1;
00346   double tau_tr = 1/dist2;
00347   double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? (tau + tau_tr)*visc_turb : 0.0;
00348 
00349   if(DERIVED_T::IS_VAR && DERIVED_T::IS_TURB)
00350     {
00351       aii3_4 = ((tau+tau_tr)*visc_lam + reyn)*surf*poros;
00352       aii1_2 = ajj1_2  = ((tau+tau_tr)*visc_lam + reyn)*surfporos;
00353     }
00354   else
00355     {
00356       aii3_4 = (tau*visc_lam + reyn)*surf*poros;
00357       aii1_2 = ajj1_2  = (tau_tr*visc_lam + reyn)*surfporos;
00358     }
00359 }
00360 
00361 //// secmem_arete_fluide
00362 //
00363 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00364 inline void Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::secmem_arete_fluide(int fac1, int fac2, int fac3, int signe,
00365                                                                double& flux3, double& flux1_2) const
00366 {
00367   int rang1 = (fac1-premiere_face_bord);
00368   int rang2 = (fac2-premiere_face_bord);
00369   int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
00370   int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
00371   int ori= orientation(fac3);
00372   double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00373   double visc_turb = nu_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00374   double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00375   double poros = porosity_(fac1,fac2);
00376   double dist = dist_norm_bord(fac1);
00377 
00378   double vit_imp = 0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang1,ori,la_zcl)+
00379                         Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang2,ori,la_zcl));
00380 
00381   double tau = signe*vit_imp/dist;
00382   double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? tau*visc_turb : 0.0;
00383 
00384   // XXX : if we regroup => SOME TEST CASES BROKE UP !
00385   if(DERIVED_T::IS_TURB)
00386     flux3 = (tau*visc_lam + reyn)*surf*poros;
00387   else
00388     flux3 = tau*surf*visc_lam*poros;
00389 
00390   flux1_2 = 0;
00391 }
00392 
00393 //// flux_arete_interne
00394 //
00395 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00396 inline double Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::flux_arete_interne(const DoubleTab& inco, int fac1,
00397                                                                 int fac2, int fac3, int fac4) const
00398 {
00399   double flux;
00400   int ori1=orientation(fac1);
00401   int ori3 = orientation(fac3);
00402   int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
00403   int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
00404   int elem3 = elem_(fac4,0);
00405   int elem4 = elem_(fac4,1);
00406   double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_4pts(elem1,elem2,elem3,elem4,ori3);
00407   double visc_turb = nu_mean_4pts(elem1,elem2,elem3,elem4,ori3);
00408   double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00409   double poros = porosity_(fac1,fac2);
00410 
00411   double tau = (inco[fac4]-inco[fac3])/dist_face(fac3,fac4,ori1);
00412   double tau_tr = (inco[fac2]-inco[fac1])/dist_face(fac1,fac2,ori3);
00413   double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? (tau + tau_tr)*visc_turb : 0.0;
00414 
00415   if (DERIVED_T::IS_VAR && DERIVED_T::IS_TURB)
00416     flux = (reyn + visc_lam*(tau+tau_tr))* surf*poros;
00417   else
00418     flux = (reyn + visc_lam*tau)*surf*poros;
00419 
00420   return flux;
00421 }
00422 
00423 //// coeffs_arete_interne
00424 //
00425 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00426 inline void Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::coeffs_arete_interne(int fac1, int fac2, int fac3, int fac4,
00427                                                                 double& aii, double& ajj) const
00428 {
00429   int ori1=orientation(fac1);
00430   int ori3 = orientation(fac3);
00431   int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
00432   int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
00433   int elem3 = elem_(fac4,0);
00434   int elem4 = elem_(fac4,1);
00435   double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_4pts(elem1,elem2,elem3,elem4,ori3);
00436   double visc_turb = nu_mean_4pts(elem1,elem2,elem3,elem4,ori3);
00437   double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00438   double poros = porosity_(fac1,fac2);
00439 
00440   double tau = 1/dist_face(fac3,fac4,ori1);
00441   double tau_tr = 1/dist_face(fac1,fac2,ori3);
00442   double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? (tau + tau_tr)*visc_turb : 0.0;
00443 
00444   if (DERIVED_T::IS_VAR && DERIVED_T::IS_TURB)
00445     aii = ajj = (reyn + visc_lam*(tau+tau_tr))*surf*poros;
00446   else
00447     aii = ajj = (reyn + visc_lam*tau)*surf*poros;
00448 }
00449 
00450 //// flux_arete_mixte
00451 //
00452 // DIFT : Sur les aretes mixtes les termes croises du tenseur de Reynolds
00453 // sont nuls: il ne reste donc que la diffusion laminaire
00454 // E Saikali ???? Are you sure ?
00455 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00456 inline double Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::flux_arete_mixte(const DoubleTab& inco, int fac1,
00457                                                               int fac2, int fac3, int fac4) const
00458 {
00459   double flux=0;
00460 
00461   if (inco[fac4]*inco[fac3] != 0)
00462     {
00463       int ori1 = orientation(fac1);
00464       int ori3 = orientation(fac3);
00465       int elem[4];
00466       elem[0] = elem_(fac3,0);
00467       elem[1] = elem_(fac3,1);
00468       elem[2] = elem_(fac4,0);
00469       elem[3] = elem_(fac4,1);
00470 
00471       double visc_lam_temp=0;
00472       double visc_turb_temp=0;
00473       for (int i=0; i<4; i++)
00474         if (elem[i] != -1)
00475           {
00476             visc_lam_temp += nu_lam(elem[i]);
00477             visc_turb_temp += nu_turb(elem[i]);
00478           }
00479       visc_lam_temp/=3.0;
00480       visc_turb_temp/=3.0;
00481 
00482       double visc_lam = DERIVED_T::IS_VAR ? visc_lam_temp : nu_lam(0);
00483       double visc_turb = visc_turb_temp;
00484       double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00485       double poros = porosity_(fac1,fac2);
00486 
00487       double tau = (inco[fac4]-inco[fac3])/dist_face(fac3,fac4,ori1);
00488       double tau_tr = (inco[fac2]-inco[fac1])/dist_face(fac1,fac2,ori3);
00489       double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? (tau + tau_tr)*visc_turb : 0.0;
00490 
00491       if (DERIVED_T::IS_VAR && DERIVED_T::IS_TURB)
00492         flux = (reyn + visc_lam*(tau+tau_tr)) * surf * poros;
00493       else
00494         flux = tau * surf * visc_lam * poros;
00495     }
00496   return flux;
00497 }
00498 
00499 //// coeffs_arete_mixte
00500 //
00501 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00502 inline void Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::coeffs_arete_mixte(int fac1, int fac2, int fac3, int fac4,
00503                                                               double& aii, double& ajj) const
00504 {
00505   if (inconnue->valeurs()[fac4]*inconnue->valeurs()[fac3] != 0)
00506     {
00507       int ori1 = orientation(fac1);
00508       int ori3 = orientation(fac3);
00509       int elem[4];
00510       elem[0] = elem_(fac3,0);
00511       elem[1] = elem_(fac3,1);
00512       elem[2] = elem_(fac4,0);
00513       elem[3] = elem_(fac4,1);
00514 
00515       double visc_lam_temp=0;
00516       double visc_turb_temp=0;
00517       for (int i=0; i<4; i++)
00518         if (elem[i] != -1)
00519           {
00520             visc_lam_temp += nu_lam(elem[i]);
00521             visc_turb_temp += nu_turb(elem[i]);
00522           }
00523       visc_lam_temp/=3.0;
00524       visc_turb_temp/=3.0;
00525 
00526       double visc_lam = DERIVED_T::IS_VAR ? visc_lam_temp : nu_lam(0);
00527       double visc_turb = visc_turb_temp;
00528       double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00529       double poros = porosity_(fac1,fac2);
00530 
00531       double tau = 1/dist_face(fac3,fac4,ori1);
00532       double tau_tr = 1/dist_face(fac1,fac2,ori3);
00533       double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? (tau + tau_tr)*visc_turb : 0.0;
00534 
00535       // XXX : if we regroup => SOME TEST CASES BROKE UP !
00536       if (DERIVED_T::IS_TURB && DERIVED_T::IS_VAR)
00537         aii = ajj = (reyn + visc_lam*(tau+tau_tr))* surf * poros;
00538       else
00539         aii = ajj= surf * visc_lam * poros * tau;
00540     }
00541   else
00542     aii=ajj=0;
00543 }
00544 
00545 //// flux_arete_paroi
00546 //
00547 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00548 inline double Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::flux_arete_paroi(const DoubleTab& inco, int fac1,
00549                                                               int fac2, int fac3, int signe) const
00550 {
00551   double flux;
00552   int rang1 = (fac1-premiere_face_bord);
00553   int rang2 = (fac2-premiere_face_bord);
00554   int ori = orientation(fac3);
00555   double vit = inco(fac3);
00556 
00557   double vit_imp = 0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang1,ori,la_zcl)+
00558                         Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang2,ori,la_zcl));
00559 
00560   if ( !uses_wall_law() )
00561     {
00562       int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
00563       int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
00564       if (elem1==-1)
00565         elem1 = elem2;
00566       else if (elem2==-1)
00567         elem2 = elem1;
00568 
00569       double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00570       double visc_turb = nu_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00571       double dist = dist_norm_bord(fac1);
00572       double tau  = signe*(vit_imp - inco[fac3])/dist;
00573       double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00574       if (DERIVED_T::IS_TURB && DERIVED_T::IS_VAR)
00575         flux = tau*surf*(visc_lam+visc_turb);
00576       else
00577         flux = tau*surf*visc_lam;
00578     }
00579   else
00580     {
00581       // On calcule u_star*u_star*surf sur chaque partie de la facette de Qdm
00582       int signe_terme;
00583       if ( vit < vit_imp )
00584         signe_terme = -1;
00585       else
00586         signe_terme = 1;
00587 
00588       //30/09/2003  YB : influence de signe terme eliminee, signe pris en compte dans la loi de paroi
00589       signe_terme = 1;
00590       double tau1 = tau_tan(rang1,ori)*0.5*surface(fac1);
00591       double tau2 = tau_tan(rang2,ori)*0.5*surface(fac2);
00592       double coef = tau1+tau2;
00593       flux = signe_terme*coef;
00594     }
00595 
00596   return flux;
00597 }
00598 
00599 //// coeffs_arete_paroi
00600 //
00601 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00602 inline void Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::coeffs_arete_paroi(int fac1, int fac2, int fac3, int signe, double& aii1_2, double& aii3_4,
00603                                                               double& ajj1_2) const
00604 {
00605   if ( !uses_wall_law())
00606     {
00607       int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
00608       int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
00609       if (elem1==-1)
00610         elem1 = elem2;
00611       else if (elem2==-1)
00612         elem2 = elem1;
00613 
00614       int ori = orientation(fac3);
00615       double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00616       double visc_turb = nu_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00617       double dist = dist_norm_bord(fac1);
00618       double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00619 
00620       aii1_2 = ajj1_2 = 0;
00621 
00622       aii3_4 = (DERIVED_T::IS_TURB && DERIVED_T::IS_VAR) ? signe*surf*(visc_lam+visc_turb)/dist :
00623                signe*surf*visc_lam/dist;
00624     }
00625   else
00626     aii3_4 = aii1_2 = ajj1_2 = 0;
00627 }
00628 
00629 
00630 //// secmem_arete_paroi
00631 //
00632 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00633 inline double Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::secmem_arete_paroi(int fac1, int fac2, int fac3, int signe) const
00634 {
00635   double flux;
00636   int ori = orientation(fac3);
00637   int rang1 = (fac1-premiere_face_bord);
00638   int rang2 = (fac2-premiere_face_bord);
00639   int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
00640   int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
00641 
00642   const DoubleTab& inco = inconnue->valeurs();
00643   double vit = inco(fac3);
00644 
00645   double vit_imp = 0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang1,ori,la_zcl)+
00646                         Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang2,ori,la_zcl));
00647 
00648   double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00649   double visc_turb = nu_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00650 
00651   if ( !uses_wall_law() )
00652     {
00653       double dist = dist_norm_bord(fac1);
00654       double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00655       double tau  = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? signe*(vit_imp - inco[fac3])/dist : signe * vit_imp/dist;
00656 
00657       flux = (DERIVED_T::IS_TURB && DERIVED_T::IS_VAR) ? tau*surf*(visc_lam+visc_turb) :
00658              tau * surf * visc_lam;
00659     }
00660   else
00661     {
00662       // On calcule u_star*u_star*surf sur chaque partie de la facette de Qdm
00663       int signe_terme;
00664       if ( vit < vit_imp )
00665         signe_terme = -1;
00666       else
00667         signe_terme = 1;
00668 
00669       //30/09/2003  YB : influence de signe terme eliminee, signe pris en compte dans la loi de paroi
00670       signe_terme = 1;
00671       double tau1 = tau_tan(rang1,ori)*0.5*surface(fac1);
00672       double tau2 = tau_tan(rang2,ori)*0.5*surface(fac2);
00673       double coef = tau1+tau2;
00674       flux = signe_terme*coef;
00675     }
00676 
00677   return flux;
00678 }
00679 
00680 //// flux_arete_paroi_fluide
00681 //
00682 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00683 inline void Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::flux_arete_paroi_fluide(const DoubleTab& inco, int fac1,
00684                                                                    int fac2, int fac3, int signe,
00685                                                                    double& flux3, double& flux1_2) const
00686 {
00687   int rang1 = (fac1-premiere_face_bord);
00688   int rang2 = (fac2-premiere_face_bord);
00689   int ori= orientation(fac3);
00690   int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
00691   int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
00692   double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00693   double visc_turb = nu_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00694   double vit_imp;
00695 
00696   // On ne sait pas qui de fac1 ou de fac2 est la face de paroi
00697   if (est_egal(inco[fac1],0)) // fac1 est la face de paroi
00698     vit_imp = Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang2,ori,la_zcl);
00699   else  // fac2 est la face de paroi
00700     vit_imp = Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang1,ori,la_zcl);
00701 
00702   double dist1 = dist_norm_bord(fac1);
00703   double dist2 =dist_face(fac1,fac2,ori);
00704   double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00705   double poros = porosity_(fac1, fac2);
00706   double surfporos = surface(fac3)*porosite(fac3);
00707 
00708   double tau = signe * (vit_imp - inco[fac3])/dist1;
00709   double tau_tr = (inco[fac2] - inco[fac1])/dist2;
00710   double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? (tau + tau_tr)*visc_turb : 0.0;
00711 
00712   if(DERIVED_T::IS_VAR && DERIVED_T::IS_TURB)
00713     {
00714       flux3 = ((tau+tau_tr)*visc_lam + reyn) * surf * poros;
00715       flux1_2 = ((tau+tau_tr)*visc_lam + reyn) * surfporos;
00716     }
00717   else
00718     {
00719       flux3 = (tau*visc_lam + reyn) * surf * poros;
00720       flux1_2 = (tau_tr*visc_lam + reyn) * surfporos;
00721     }
00722 }
00723 
00724 //// coeffs_arete_paroi_fluide
00725 //
00726 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00727 inline void Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::coeffs_arete_paroi_fluide(int fac1, int fac2, int fac3, int signe,
00728                                                                      double& aii1_2, double& aii3_4,
00729                                                                      double& ajj1_2) const
00730 {
00731   int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
00732   int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
00733   int ori= orientation(fac3);
00734   double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00735   double visc_turb = nu_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00736   double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00737   double poros = porosity_(fac1, fac2);
00738   double surfporos = surface(fac3)*porosite(fac3);
00739   double dist1 = dist_norm_bord(fac1);
00740   double dist2 = dist_face(fac1,fac2,ori);
00741 
00742   double tau = signe/dist1;
00743   double tau_tr = 1/dist2;
00744   double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? (tau + tau_tr)*visc_turb : 0.0;
00745 
00746   if(DERIVED_T::IS_VAR && DERIVED_T::IS_TURB)
00747     {
00748       aii3_4 = ((tau+tau_tr)*visc_lam + reyn)*surf*poros;
00749       aii1_2 = ajj1_2 =((tau+tau_tr)*visc_lam + reyn)*surfporos;
00750     }
00751   else
00752     {
00753       aii3_4 = (tau*visc_lam + reyn)*surf*poros;
00754       aii1_2 = ajj1_2 =(tau_tr*visc_lam + reyn)*surfporos;
00755     }
00756 }
00757 
00758 //// secmem_arete_paroi_fluide
00759 //
00760 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00761 inline void Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::secmem_arete_paroi_fluide(int fac1, int fac2, int fac3, int signe,
00762                                                                      double& flux3, double& flux1_2) const
00763 {
00764   int rang1 = (fac1-premiere_face_bord);
00765   int rang2 = (fac2-premiere_face_bord);
00766   int ori= orientation(fac3);
00767   int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
00768   int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
00769   double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00770   double visc_turb = nu_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00771   double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00772   double poros = porosity_(fac1, fac2);
00773   double dist = dist_norm_bord(fac1);
00774   double vit_imp;
00775 
00776   // On ne sait pas qui de fac1 ou de fac2 est la face de paroi
00777   if (est_egal(inconnue->valeurs()[fac1],0)) // fac1 est la face de paroi
00778     vit_imp = Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang2,ori,la_zcl);
00779   else  // fac2 est la face de paroi
00780     vit_imp = Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang1,ori,la_zcl);
00781 
00782   double tau = signe*vit_imp/dist;
00783   double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? tau*visc_turb : 0.0;
00784 
00785   if(DERIVED_T::IS_TURB)
00786     flux3 = (tau*visc_lam + reyn) * surf * poros;
00787   else
00788     flux3 = tau * surf * visc_lam * poros;
00789 
00790   flux1_2 = 0;
00791 }
00792 
00793 //// flux_arete_periodicite
00794 //
00795 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00796 inline void Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::flux_arete_periodicite(const DoubleTab& inco,
00797                                                                   int fac1, int fac2, int fac3, int fac4,
00798                                                                   double& flux3_4, double& flux1_2) const
00799 {
00800   int ori1 = orientation(fac1);
00801   int ori3 = orientation(fac3);
00802   int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
00803   int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
00804   int elem3 = elem_(fac4,0);
00805   int elem4 = elem_(fac4,1);
00806   double dist3_4 = dist_face_period(fac3,fac4,ori1);
00807   double dist1_2 = dist_face_period(fac1,fac2,ori3);
00808 
00809   double surf1_2 = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00810   double poros1_2 = porosity_(fac1, fac2);
00811   double surf3_4 = surface_(fac3,fac4);
00812   double poros3_4 = porosity_(fac3, fac4);
00813   double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_4pts(elem1,elem2,elem3,elem4,ori3);
00814   double visc_turb = nu_mean_4pts(elem1,elem2,elem3,elem4,ori3);
00815 
00816   double tau = (inco[fac4]-inco[fac3])/dist3_4;
00817   double tau_tr = (inco[fac2]-inco[fac1])/dist1_2;
00818   double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? (tau + tau_tr)*visc_turb : 0.0;
00819 
00820   if(DERIVED_T::IS_VAR && DERIVED_T::IS_TURB)
00821     {
00822       flux3_4 = (reyn + visc_lam*(tau+tau_tr)) * surf1_2 * poros1_2;
00823       flux1_2 = (reyn + visc_lam*(tau+tau_tr)) * surf3_4 * poros3_4;
00824     }
00825   else
00826     {
00827       flux3_4 = (reyn + visc_lam*tau) * surf1_2 * poros1_2;
00828       flux1_2 = (reyn + visc_lam*tau_tr) * surf3_4 * poros3_4;
00829     }
00830 }
00831 
00832 //// coeffs_arete_periodicite
00833 //
00834 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00835 inline void Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::coeffs_arete_periodicite(int fac1, int fac2, int fac3, int fac4,
00836                                                                     double& aii, double& ajj) const
00837 {
00838   int ori1 = orientation(fac1);
00839   int ori3 = orientation(fac3);
00840   int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
00841   int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
00842   int elem3 = elem_(fac4,0);
00843   int elem4 = elem_(fac4,1);
00844   double dist3_4 = dist_face_period(fac3,fac4,ori1);
00845   double dist1_2 = dist_face_period(fac1,fac2,ori3);
00846   double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_4pts(elem1,elem2,elem3,elem4,ori3);
00847   double visc_turb = nu_mean_4pts(elem1,elem2,elem3,elem4,ori3);
00848   double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00849   double poros = porosity_(fac1, fac2);
00850 
00851   double tau = 1/dist3_4;
00852   double tau_tr = 1/dist1_2;
00853   double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? (tau + tau_tr) * visc_turb : 0.0;
00854 
00855   if(DERIVED_T::IS_VAR && DERIVED_T::IS_TURB)
00856     aii = ajj = (reyn + visc_lam*(tau+tau_tr))* surf * poros;
00857   else
00858     aii = ajj = (reyn + visc_lam*tau) * surf * poros;
00859 }
00860 
00861 //// flux_fa7_elem
00862 //
00863 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00864 inline double Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::flux_fa7_elem(const DoubleTab& inco, int elem,
00865                                                            int fac1, int fac2) const
00866 {
00867   double flux;
00868   int ori=orientation(fac1);
00869   double dist = dist_face(fac1,fac2,ori);
00870   double tau = (inco[fac2]-inco[fac1])/dist;
00871   double surf = 0.5*(surface(fac1)*porosite(fac1)+surface(fac2)*porosite(fac2));
00872   double visc_lam = nu_lam(elem);
00873 
00874   // On considere que l energie est dans la pression
00875   double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? - 2.*nu_turb(elem)*tau : 0.0;
00876 
00877   if(DERIVED_T::IS_VAR && DERIVED_T::IS_TURB)
00878     flux = (-reyn + 2.*visc_lam*tau) * surf ;
00879   else
00880     flux = (-reyn + visc_lam*tau) * surf ;
00881 
00882   return flux;
00883 }
00884 
00885 //// coeffs_fa7_elem
00886 //
00887 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00888 inline void Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::coeffs_fa7_elem(int elem,int fac1,
00889                                                            int fac2, double& aii, double& ajj) const
00890 {
00891   int ori = orientation(fac1);
00892   double tau = 1/dist_face(fac1,fac2,ori);
00893   double surf = 0.5*(surface(fac1)*porosite(fac1)+surface(fac2)*porosite(fac2));
00894   double visc_lam = nu_lam(elem);
00895 
00896   // On considere que l energie est dans la pression
00897   //  double reyn = 2./3.*k_elem - 2.*dv_diffusivite_turbulente(elem)*tau ;
00898   double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? - 2.*nu_turb(elem)*tau : 0.0;
00899 
00900   if(DERIVED_T::IS_VAR && DERIVED_T::IS_TURB)
00901     aii = ajj =(-reyn +2.*visc_lam*tau) * surf;
00902   else
00903     aii = ajj =(-reyn + visc_lam*tau) * surf;
00904 }
00905 
00906 //// flux_arete_symetrie_fluide
00907 //
00908 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00909 inline void Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::flux_arete_symetrie_fluide(const DoubleTab& inco, int fac1,
00910                                                                       int fac2, int fac3, int signe,
00911                                                                       double& flux3, double& flux1_2) const
00912 {
00913   int rang1 = (fac1-premiere_face_bord);
00914   int rang2 = (fac2-premiere_face_bord);
00915   int ori= orientation(fac3);
00916   int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
00917   int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
00918   double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00919   double visc_turb = nu_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00920   double dist1 = dist_norm_bord(fac1);
00921   double dist2 = dist_face(fac1,fac2,ori);
00922   double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00923   double poros = porosity_(fac1,fac2);
00924   double surfporos = surface(fac3)*porosite(fac3);
00925 
00926   double vit_imp = 0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord_sym(inco,inconnue->temps(),rang1,ori,la_zcl)+
00927                         Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord_sym(inco,inconnue->temps(),rang2,ori,la_zcl));
00928 
00929   double tau = signe * (vit_imp - inco[fac3])/dist1;
00930   double tau_tr = (inco[fac2] - inco[fac1])/dist2;
00931   double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? (tau + tau_tr)*visc_turb : 0.0;
00932 
00933   if(DERIVED_T::IS_VAR && DERIVED_T::IS_TURB)
00934     {
00935       flux3 = ((tau+tau_tr)*visc_lam + reyn) * surf * poros;
00936       flux1_2 = ((tau+tau_tr)* visc_lam + reyn) * surfporos;
00937     }
00938   else
00939     {
00940       flux3 = (tau*visc_lam + reyn) * surf * poros;
00941       flux1_2 = DERIVED_T::IS_VAR ? 0.5 * tau_tr * visc_lam * surfporos : (tau_tr*visc_lam + reyn) * surfporos;
00942     }
00943 }
00944 
00945 //// coeffs_arete_symetrie_fluide
00946 //
00947 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00948 inline void Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::coeffs_arete_symetrie_fluide(int fac1, int fac2,
00949                                                                         int fac3, int signe,
00950                                                                         double& aii1_2, double& aii3_4,
00951                                                                         double& ajj1_2) const
00952 {
00953   int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
00954   int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
00955   int ori= orientation(fac3);
00956   double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00957   double visc_turb = nu_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00958   double dist1 = dist_norm_bord(fac1);
00959   double dist2 = dist_face(fac1,fac2,ori);
00960   double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00961   double poros = porosity_(fac1,fac2);
00962   double surfporos = surface(fac3)*porosite(fac3);
00963 
00964   double tau = signe/dist1;
00965   double tau_tr = 1/dist2;
00966   double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? (tau + tau_tr)*visc_turb : 0.0;
00967 
00968   if(DERIVED_T::IS_VAR && DERIVED_T::IS_TURB)
00969     {
00970       aii3_4 = ((tau+tau_tr)*visc_lam + reyn) * surf * poros;
00971       aii1_2 = ajj1_2  = ((tau+tau_tr)*visc_lam + reyn) * surfporos;
00972     }
00973   else
00974     {
00975       aii3_4 = (tau*visc_lam + reyn)*surf*poros;
00976       aii1_2 = ajj1_2  = DERIVED_T::IS_VAR ? 0.5 * tau_tr * visc_lam * surfporos : (tau_tr * visc_lam + reyn) * surfporos;
00977     }
00978 }
00979 
00980 //// secmem_arete_symetrie_fluide
00981 //
00982 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00983 inline void Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::secmem_arete_symetrie_fluide(int fac1, int fac2, int fac3,
00984                                                                         int signe,
00985                                                                         double& flux3, double& flux1_2) const
00986 {
00987   int rang1 = (fac1-premiere_face_bord);
00988   int rang2 = (fac2-premiere_face_bord);
00989   int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
00990   int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
00991   int ori= orientation(fac3);
00992   double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00993   double visc_turb = nu_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
00994   double dist = dist_norm_bord(fac1);
00995   double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
00996   double poros = porosity_(fac1,fac2);
00997 
00998   double vit_imp = 0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang1,ori,la_zcl)+
00999                         Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang2,ori,la_zcl));
01000 
01001   double tau = signe*vit_imp/dist;
01002   double reyn = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? tau*visc_turb : 0.0;
01003 
01004   flux3 = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? (tau*visc_lam + reyn) * surf * poros : tau*surf*visc_lam*poros;
01005   flux1_2 = 0;
01006 }
01007 
01008 //// flux_arete_symetrie_paroi
01009 //
01010 template <typename DERIVED_T>
01011 inline double Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::flux_arete_symetrie_paroi(const DoubleTab& inco, int fac1,
01012                                                                        int fac2, int fac3, int signe) const
01013 {
01014   double flux;
01015   int rang1 = (fac1-premiere_face_bord);
01016   int rang2 = (fac2-premiere_face_bord);
01017   int ori = orientation(fac3);
01018 
01019   if ( !uses_wall_law() )
01020     {
01021       int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
01022       int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
01023       double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
01024       double visc_turb = nu_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
01025       double surf =  surface_(fac1,fac2);
01026       double dist = dist_norm_bord(fac1);
01027 
01028       double vit_imp = 0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord_sym(inco,inconnue->temps(),rang1,ori,la_zcl)+
01029                             Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord_sym(inco,inconnue->temps(),rang2,ori,la_zcl));
01030 
01031       double tau  = signe*(vit_imp - inco[fac3])/dist;
01032 
01033       flux = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? tau * surf * (visc_lam + visc_turb) : tau * surf * visc_lam;
01034     }
01035   else
01036     {
01037       // solution retenue pour le calcul du frottement sachant que sur l'une des faces
01038       // tau_tan vaut 0 car c'est une face qui porte une condition de symetrie
01039       // On calcule u_star*u_star*surf sur chaque partie de la facette de Qdm
01040       double tau1 = tau_tan(rang1,ori)*0.5*surface(fac1);
01041       double tau2 = tau_tan(rang2,ori)*0.5*surface(fac2);
01042       flux = tau1+tau2;
01043     }
01044   return flux;
01045 }
01046 
01047 //// coeffs_arete_symetrie_paroi
01048 //
01049 template <typename DERIVED_T>
01050 inline void Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::coeffs_arete_symetrie_paroi(int fac1, int fac2, int fac3,
01051                                                                        int signe, double& aii1_2,
01052                                                                        double& aii3_4, double& ajj1_2) const
01053 {
01054   if ( !uses_wall_law() )
01055     {
01056       int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
01057       int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
01058       int ori = orientation(fac3);
01059       double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
01060       double visc_turb = nu_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
01061       double dist = dist_norm_bord(fac1);
01062       double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
01063 
01064       aii1_2 = ajj1_2 = 0;
01065       aii3_4 = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? ( DERIVED_T::IS_VAR ? signe * surf * (visc_lam + visc_turb) / dist : 0.0 )
01066                  : signe * surf * visc_lam / dist;
01067     }
01068   else
01069     aii3_4 = aii1_2 = ajj1_2 =0;
01070 }
01071 
01072 //// secmem_arete_symetrie_paroi
01073 //
01074 template <typename DERIVED_T>
01075 inline double Eval_Diff_VDF_Face<DERIVED_T>::secmem_arete_symetrie_paroi(int fac1, int fac2, int fac3,
01076                                                                          int signe) const
01077 {
01078   double flux;
01079   int rang1 = (fac1-premiere_face_bord);
01080   int rang2 = (fac2-premiere_face_bord);
01081   int ori = orientation(fac3);
01082 
01083   if ( !uses_wall_law() )
01084     {
01085       int elem1 = elem_(fac3,0);
01086       int elem2 = elem_(fac3,1);
01087       double dist = dist_norm_bord(fac1);
01088       double visc_lam = nu_lam_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
01089       double visc_turb = nu_mean_2pts(elem1,elem2,ori);
01090       double surf = surface_(fac1,fac2);
01091       const DoubleTab& inco = inconnue->valeurs();
01092 
01093       double vit_imp = 0.5*(Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang1,ori,la_zcl)+
01094                             Champ_Face_get_val_imp_face_bord(inconnue->temps(),rang2,ori,la_zcl));
01095 
01096       // WHY WHY WHY ?
01097       double tau  = DERIVED_T::IS_TURB ? signe * (vit_imp - inco[fac3]) / dist :
01098                     signe * vit_imp / dist;
01099 
01100       flux = (DERIVED_T::IS_TURB && DERIVED_T::IS_VAR) ? tau * surf * (visc_lam + visc_turb) :
01101              tau * surf * visc_lam;
01102     }
01103   else
01104     {
01105       // solution retenue pour le calcul du frottement sachant que sur l'une des faces
01106       // tau_tan vaut 0 car c'est une face qui porte une condition de symetrie
01107       // On calcule u_star*u_star*surf sur chaque partie de la facette de Qdm
01108       double tau1 = tau_tan(rang1,ori)*0.5*surface(fac1);
01109       double tau2 = tau_tan(rang2,ori)*0.5*surface(fac2);
01110       flux = tau1 + tau2;
01111     }
01112 
01113   return flux;
01114 }
